title: Blox Fruits: How to Obtain the Powerful Venom Fruit

steps.title: Venom Fruit is a Mythical Natural-type Blox Fruit.
steps.content: Venom Fruit is a Mythical Natural-type Blox Fruit. It is available for purchase at the Blox Fruit Dealer for $3,000,000 or 2,450 Robux. It is an indigo purple-colored fruit covered in a dark magenta-colored sludge. On top of the fruit are three dragon heads, two of which are emitting yellow smog. This fruit was released in 2021.

steps.title: Venom is one of the most powerful fruits in the game.
steps.content: Venom is one of the most powerful fruits in the game. It does a lot of damage, has great passive abilities, and is easy to use. It's also very versatile, being a great fruit for farming, PvP, grinding, and Sea Events.

steps.title: Poison Daggers (Z)
steps.content: Poison Daggers ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Description: You shoot a flurry of poisonous blades. The longer you hold Z , the more blades you will fire. Poison puddles will be left on the ground after the blades hit their target. This move breaks instinct, but it can be dodged if you're not close enough to the enemy. Transformed: The poison blades appear red, and they have increased hitbox, range, and damage.

steps.title: Noxious Shot (X)
steps.content: Noxious Shot ( X ) Mastery cost: 100 Mastery Description: You create a poison ball in your hands while you hold down X . Once you release the key, three poison bolts will be launched at the enemy. These bolts will damage the enemy and also leave a poison puddle that splits into three additional puddles. This move breaks instinct, but it can be dodged. Transformed: The range of the poison bolts is increased.

steps.title: Toxic Fog (C)
steps.content: Toxic Fog ( C ) Mastery cost: 200 Mastery Description: You create a veil of toxic smoke around you, which lasts for the duration of the move. Any enemy who gets close to you will take tick damage for as long as they are near you. They will also take additional poison tick damage, even if they move away from you. If an enemy is inside the fog, they will have their instinct broken. Transformed: You breathe out a massive poison cloud that surrounds your character. Anyone within range of this cloud takes massive damage. Enemies in the cloud can't Air Jump, dodge, or dash until they get out of the cloud or it disappears.

steps.title: Transformation (V)
steps.content: Transformation ( V ) Mastery cost: 300 Mastery Description: You transform into a three-headed dragon that is large, purple, walks on two legs, and has wings. Transforming will use 20% of the Fury Meter (see information about passives below ). When transformed, your attacks do more damage, and poison puddle damage is greatly increased. You also get 50% defense against all attacks, and you are immune to all left mouse button attacks from other players. However, when transformed, you can't use any other moves besides Venom Fruit abilities. Transformed: You turn back into your normal form.

steps.title: Serpent's Wrath (F)
steps.content: Serpent's Wrath ( F ) Mastery cost: 50 Mastery Description: You create a serpent out of venom, which allows you to fly. The lower your health, the faster you can move. Any enemy who touches the poison serpent will take poison damage over time. When you stop moving, the snake's head explodes, which does AoE damage. Anyone caught in the explosion will have their instinct broken. Transformed: The serpent is larger when you're transformed, and you move faster. Three dragon heads gravitate around the serpent, and these heads will be released when you stop holding F . They will seek out nearby enemies to damage them. Unlike the untransformed version of this move, enemies touched by the poison serpent won't take poison damage over time.

steps.title: Fury Meter
steps.content: Fury Meter When the Fury Meter is full, you can transform. Once you transform, the Fury Meter will drain over time. Using moves when transformed will also lower the Fury Meter. When not transformed, the Fury Meter will gradually refill itself. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Deadly Poison
steps.content: Deadly Poison When you do your X, C, and F moves, nearby enemies will be poisoned. This poison does a lot of damage over time.

steps.title: Poison Puddles
steps.content: Poison Puddles When you do your Z, X, and transformed C moves, poisonous puddles will be created. If an enemy stands on a puddle, they will take poison damage over time.

steps.title: Venomous Drop
steps.content: Venomous Drop When you're transformed, falling to the ground from a tall height (either from jumping off something or doing Air Jumps and falling back down to the ground) will cause a small explosion to occur, after which a few poison puddles will be formed on the ground.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Extremely versatile Great for almost any playstyle All moves (except Transformation) break instinct [2] X Research source Does a lot of damage Transformation is very strong

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Very expensive High mastery requirements Moves are a little slow Fury Meter can only be increased passively Transformed state has a larger hitbox
